xmlDump.sql: SELECT tits.title_id as id, GROUP_CONCAT(persons.last_name, ', ', persons.first_name ORDER BY persons.last_name SEPARATOR ' ') as creator, tits.title as title, IF(CHAR_LENGTH(tits.pub_editor) = 0, IFNULL(tits.pub_location, ''), CONCAT(tits.pub_editor, ', ', IFNULL(tits.pub_location, ''))) as publisher, tits.pub_year as pub_date, tits.pages as pages, tits.keywords as subject FROM (SELECT titles.*, GROUP_CONCAT(keywords.keyword ORDER BY keywords.keyword SEPARATOR '###') as keywords FROM titles, titles_keywords, keywords WHERE titles_keywords.title_id = titles.title_id AND titles_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id GROUP BY titles.title_id ) as tits, titles_persons, persons WHERE titles_persons.title_id = tits.title_id AND titles_persons.person_id = persons.person_id GROUP BY tits.title_id
